name: Plug it! (ArtemAnikin)
description:
A 2D platformer game made for the Global Game Jam 2018 Theme: Transmission.

In the game you control a robot that transmits energy around him. Your goal is to complete the level activating different electronic mechanisms that appear in the level.

You can activate some mechanisms like switchs, platforms and doors, or possess other robots with new mechanics like shooting or bigger jumps.

Made by: Javier Hernández, Julio Paniagua, Artem Anikin.
